articles.title: Moffi tipped to succeed in Europe’s big leagues - Punch Newspapers
articles.description: Lorient manager Regis Le Bris has hailed striker Terem Moffi following his blistering form since the start of the 2022/23 season.
articles.content:
Lorient manager Regis Le Bris has hailed striker Terem Moffi following his blistering form since the start of the 2022/23 season.

articles.author: Mark Pirie
articles.title: Celtic and Rangers on Champions League red alert as Florentino Perez makes final Super League gambit - Daily Record
articles.description: The Real Madrid supremo is hoping to bring back the controversial closed shop for Europe's elite clubs.
articles.content:
Florentino Perez has declared football is "ill" as he attempts to revive the failed European Super League as an alternative to the Champions League.
